## Your Background

What do you know already?

- Excel, Numbers, Some sort of spreadsheet software
- SAS, SPSS, Minitab
- Any other programming language
- R
- A text editor

## Installing R

Hopefully this is done already.  Otherwise for Windows or OSX:

- Go to \url{http://www.r-project.org/}
- From CRAN, pick a download site (ISU is a good choice)
- Choose link based on your OS
- Choose the "base" subdirectory to install R.
